meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>junior</kanji> <kanji>believe</kanji>r is a <vocabulary>believer</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>follower</vocabulary>. They certainly aren't the leader or anything because of their junior status, but at least they're there, and at least they're believing. Oh, and excuse me, may I take a moment of your time? I'd like to tell you about the glory that is the Crabigator....
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
